io.blocko.coinstack.openassets

Class ColoringEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.blocko.coinstack.openassets.ColoringEngine

  • public class ColoringEngine
extends Object
    a class to issue and transfer open asset and to inquire balance of open asset

    • Method Detail

      • issueAsset

        public String issueAsset(String privateKeyWIF,
                         long assetAmount,
                         String toAddress,
                         long fee)
                  throws IOException,
                         io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Issue Open Asset with a private key parameters
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - private key with WIF form which will create Open Asset ID
        assetAmount - Asset amount that user wants to issue
        toAddress - Open Asset address(different from Bitcoin address form) which receive issued open asset for the first time. It can be same as the issuer's address.
        fee - fee that user will pay for this Open Asset transaction.
        Throws:
        IOException
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException

      • transferAsset

        public String transferAsset(String privateKeyWIF,
                            String assetID,
                            long assetAmount,
                            String toAddress,
                            long fee)
                     throws Exception
        Transfer Open Asset which user possesses with a private key parameters
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - private key with WIF form which create Open Asset address
        assetID - Asset ID that can distinguish the asset from the other
        assetAmount - Asset amount that user wants to transfer
        toAddress - Open Asset address(different from Bitcoin address form) which receive open asset from the current user.
        fee - fee that user will pay for this Open Asset transaction.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • transferMultisigAsset

        public String transferMultisigAsset(List<String> privateKeyWIFs,

                                    String toAddress,
                                    long fee)
                             throws Exception

        public long getAssetBalance(String assetAddress,
                            String assetID)
                     throws Exception
        Get balance of Open Asset which user possesses in his address with asset ID parameters
        Parameters:
        assetAddress - Open Asset address
        assetID - Asset ID that can distinguish the asset from the other
        Throws:
        Exception
